DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label , five-period , single-sequence design . The purpose study follow ; 1 . Primary - To evaluate influence genotype drug metabolize enzyme transporter pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics clopidogrel - To evaluate influence aspirin pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics clopidogrel 2 . Secondary - To explore representative biomarkers variable pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics clopidogrel - To evaluate influence genotype drug metabolize enzyme transporter drug-drug interaction aspirin clopidogrel - To explore representative biomarkers drug-drug interaction aspirin clopidogrel
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Influence Genotype Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics Clopidogrel
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male subject age 20 45 year . 2 . A body weight range 50 kg ( inclusive ) 90 kg ( exclusive ) body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) 27 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . 3 . Sufficient ability understand nature study hazard participate . Provide write informed consent fully . inform study procedure . 1 . Presence history hypersensitivity allergic reaction drug include investigational product ( clopidogrel aspirin ) 2 . Clinically relevant abnormal medical history could interfere objective study . 3 . A subject history gastrointestinal disease surgery ( except simple appendectomy repair hernia ) , influence absorption study drug . 4 . A subject whose lab test result follow ; Platelet count PT , aPTT < 0.9 x low limit reference range > 1.1 x upper limit reference range . 5 . A subject whose SBP 160 mmHg 90 mmHg DBP 100 mmHg 50 mmHg . 6 . Presence history drug abuse positive result urine drug screen test . 7 . Participation clinical trial within 2 month first dose . 8 . Use CYP inducer ( ex . rifampin ) within 4 week first dose . 9 . Use prescription medicine , herbal medicine within 2 week overthecounter medication vitamin substance within 1 week first dose . 10.Use grapefruit juice within 1 week first dose . 11 . Blood donation 2 month apheresis 1 month study . 12 . Use alcohol 21 units/weeks 13 . Smoking 10 cigarettes/days within 3 month first dose . 14 . Subject judge eligible study participation investigator .
